content: download for free from lovecrafts com 1 the give it a whirl hat pattern was inspired by the knitted cute snail hat 2 by omura once again since i am not experienced enough with knitting i resorted to creating my own crochet version to achieve a similar hat the give it a whirl hat is incredibly easy and works up quickly this pattern was tested by my ravelry pal dazzlingpussycat she provided the fabulous sample hat and photos as well as great feedback on the original pattern you can view her project page on ravelry swirl for jay 3 pattern includes specific instructions to make an adult size hat as well as information on adjusting for smaller or larger hat size as always i hope you ll enjoy this pattern 1 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/give-it-a-whirl-hat-crochet-pattern-by-adrienne-lash 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cute-snail-hat 3 http //www ravelry com/projects/dazzlingpussycat/swirl-for-jay
